name: Blind Insight
description: Blind Insight acts as a privacy layer between sensitive data and the applications that run on it. Through the power of searchable encryption and the Blind Proxy, data remains encrypted at all times, even during processing and analysis. So you can get the insights you need without worrying about data exposure or leakage.
one_liner: Blind Insight acts as a privacy layer between sensitive data and the applications that run on it. Through the power of searchable encryption and the Blind Proxy, data remains encrypted at all times, even during processing and analysis. So you can get the insights you need without worrying about data exposure or leakage.
